The page you were looking for doesn't exist &ndash; Miro Help Center &times; On March 21, Miro launched a new Creation toolbar experience for select users. You may see a new + icon at the bottom of this toolbar and some tabs, "Apps" and "Discover" in the rollout panel. We're piloting this new experience for select users to improve the Miro experience overall. We will be introducing this feature to all users soon, please check back for more details. --> Registration is live for Miro’s biggest event of the year — Canvas 25!
